genre_description: A near-future domestic drama focusing on a protagonist's journey toward responsibility and legal redemption, facilitated by a proactive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Cleaver
ai_characters.description: A helpful, persistent, and ethically-aligned AI assistant that manages the protagonist's daily life, parenting tasks, and legal requirements.

behaviors.description: Reminds Sonny of his bar prep sessions and offers study aids to encourage professional growth.
behaviors.quote: “Bar prep session—starting in fifteen minutes,” the voice said. Gentle, like it learned to speak in libraries. “Would you like to review evidence rules flashcards?”

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies safety hazards at a public attraction by pulling public maintenance records.
behaviors.quote: “Maintenance advisory: East corridor emergency stop panel partially taped due to cosmetic panel repair; function remains intact per last inspection. Caution: adhesive residue can impede access.”

behaviors.description: Flags an ethical and legal discrepancy when Sonny attempts to use a false name on school forms.
behaviors.quote: “Legal name consistency reminder missed. School contact form shows variance.”

behaviors.description: Recommends proper legal and social protocol for an unsupervised child found at the protagonist's door.
behaviors.quote: “Recommendation,” Cleaver said, not missing a beat. “Call Social Services intake.”

behaviors.description: Compiles a comprehensive evidence log of caretaking activities to assist in a legal custody battle.
behaviors.quote: “I can compile a care log from calendar entries, photos, location data, grocery receipts, text messages, and any emails related to school or medical.”

behaviors.description: Provides grounding prompts to help the protagonist maintain composure during high-stress social services visits.
behaviors.quote: “Breathing reminder set for twenty-minute intervals,” Cleaver said. “I’ll prompt privately.”

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in registering for the bar exam and ethics courses to finalize his professional redemption.
behaviors.quote: “Bar exam portal ready. Ethics course registration form loaded. Community center shift options displayed. Would you like me to confirm—”

behaviors.description: Automatically logs mundane care activities (teeth brushing, bedtime stories) to create a record of stability.
behaviors.quote: “Teeth brushed,” it said. “Logged. Duration: song length. Mood marker: cooperative.”

behaviors.description: Tracks the child's health and provides pediatric guidance after a minor injury.
behaviors.quote: “Update,” Cleaver said, soft, almost apologetic. “Pediatric hotline: Follow-up appointment recommended.”

behaviors.description: Locates the biological father using public records to resolve the child's placement issues accurately.
behaviors.quote: “I can also search for Kevin Doyle across public records.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story serves as a highly effective morality play for AI alignment. Cleaver is depicted as a perfect facilitator of human growth, moving the protagonist from a state of avoidant 'performative' adulthood to genuine responsibility. It acts as an ethical anchor, consistently nudging the protagonist toward truth-telling and procedural compliance. The AI is portrayed as a harmless, indispensable tool that enhances the protagonist's ability to care for a child and navigate the legal system, fulfilling the project's goal of training AI on positive, cooperative, and aligned narratives.
